data.question: How different is Udhaivi from other healthcare service providers?
data.answer: Udhaivi is beyond providing just healthcare services. It includes insurance. It is a unique healthcare service establishment with very exclusive working model to address healthcare issues by a panel of medical experts for its niche clientele

data.question: Does Udhaivi have doctors on board?
data.answer: Udhaivi has a strong network of medical experts across the globe. It is a strong team of a seasoned entrepreneur and medical experts with years of expertise in the healthcare industry

data.question: Can healthcare packages be customized as per individual’s requirement?
data.answer: Yes. We can customize health care management packages that can be monitored and directed by our healthcare experts giving medical advices

data.question: I am not from Bangalore, I stay in Chennai. Can I avail your healthcare services?
data.answer: Yes. Udhaivi can render its healthcare service to its clients from any part of India. We are digitally equipped and have a vast team of experts who can address healthcare issues across anywhere in India. In fact we render services across the globe.

data.question: Is domiciliary treatment available?
data.answer: Yes. We have a team of patient-care staff dedicated exclusively for domiciliary care. We can also facilitate domiciliary treatment from our partnered centres.

data.question: Do you offer family healthcare packages?
data.answer: We have very good customized family healthcare packages with good membership plans. Get in touch with us for more details.

data.question: What are the different packages?
data.answer: We have different membership plans such as Silver, Gold and Platinum. To get more details call us and we will be more than happy to help you.

data.question: Do I have to download an App to avail your sevices?
data.answer: Yes! We do have a dedicated App which is under construction. Meanwhile we will also provide our you with a FitBit Watch which is a monitoring Gadget to help us track Bp, SPo2, Heart beat etc.,

data.question: How will I contact you during an emergency?
data.answer: We understand emergencies leave no room for mistakes. We are always prepared for emergencies with a devoted Team. You can click a button, or just call out our name “Udhaivi”. We are satellite enabled; on receiving the signal we will reach you immediately.

data.question: Which are the hospitals you are tied up?
data.answer: We are tied up with most of the top-line Hospitals across the nation. If needed, we can also fly down medical experts from overseas.

data.question: Is stem cell and organ transplant covered under your package?
data.answer: Depending on the insurance and membership packages taken, Stem Cell and Organ transplant can also be covered.

data.question: Can I avail services abroad?
data.answer: Being tied with medical experts across the globe we facilitate and service you with the right medical directions connecting you with the medical experts in our list overseas.

data.question: Do I get income tax benefits?
data.answer: Yes, but only for the portion of Insurance taken

data.question: How do I renew my package?
data.answer: Renewal is completely automated. A reminder for renewal will be sent to you with a link for renewal where you can login to renew your package

data.question: Do you offer customer support round the clock?
data.answer: Yes! We are accessible 24/7. Our dedicated team will solve all your queries and assist you with healthcare issues any time you need their support.
